coded_answer.p: I am writing on our class behalfon behalf of our class to thank you for organising our tourtrip into London. Our class is very appritiateappreciativegrateful to you for the goodexcellent programme. Especially, we areWe are especially interested in the sightseeing by bus on Monday morning and the river trip to Greenwich atin the afternoon. It is a good idea to include the visitingvisit ofto the Science Museum and the National Art Gallery atin the morning time on Tuesday and Wednesday respectivellyrespectively.

However, the students in our class have seen an advertisement for the London Fashion and Leisure Show at the Central Exhibition Hall of London on Tuesday from 10 am to 7 p.m. All of us would like to go to the show. It is a great opportunity because offor the following reasons. Firstly, there will be leisurleisure and sports wear and the latest fasionsfashions. Secondly, there will be exibitionsexhibitions about makeup and hair styleshairstyles. Moreover, the entrance for students is free.

We suggest changing our programme a little bit. Instead of Wednesday'sWednesday afternoonafternoon's free time we could visit the Science Museum. And on Tuesday we will enjoy the London fasionfashion and Leisure Show till 19.00. After all we willwe will all be able goto go shopping.
I am looking forward to recievingreceiving your positive reply. For the further details you can contact me myby phone number.

Famous people. What does it meansmean? From my point of viewIn my opinion, these are the people, who stay all the time in our sighsightin our sight all the time. We are intrstedinterested in politicians'spoliticians' and film stars'sstars' wearclothes, hobbyshobbies, passions and the intrigues. TheThere are lardgelarge numbers of the journalists following them all the time, even in theretheir private life.

In my opinion, each human being has a rightsright to be free. We can go for a wolkwalk, go shopping, go to the cinema, get marrigemarriagemarried or devorcedivorcedivorced. Why famous people couldn'tcan'tcan't famous people do all thisthese things? Why everybody mustmust everybody know and tolktalk about their private life? The most important thing is that the famous people are also normal people aslike us. They live aslike us, they briefbreathe and eat aslike us, they even followingfollowfall in love aslike us. I think, they mustshould have a normal, private life without journalists following them all the time and without any exact details about them appearing in the different newspaper'snewspapers' curiouses.
